providersInfo: With logging in using the same email with different providers, you can connect them to your account. You won't lose any data by doing so.

password.title: Password should include:
password.incomplete: Password does not meet the requirements

validation.username.minLength: Username should be at least 3 characters long
validation.username.maxLength: Username should be at most 20 characters long
validation.username.pattern: Username should contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes
validation.terms.required: You must agree to the terms and conditions

form.terms: I agree to the terms and conditions

banner.title: Please verify your account to get full access to the website.

verify.title: Verification
verify.subtitle: Please verify your account by binding it with your discord account.

steps.one: Create an account on JDT website

three.description2: Type <1>/verify {{username}} {{code}}</1> in the chat to bind your account with JDT

steps.four: Get full access to the website

unbind.title: Unbinding your account
unbind.subtitle: How to unbind your JDT account from your discord account?
unbind.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Unbinding your account will remove some of the access to the website but you can always bind it back or to another account.

steps.three: Click on the confirmation button below the message.

unbind.questions: If you have any questions or issues, feel free to create a ticket in <1><2>tickets</2></1> section.

checkVerification.tooltip: You need to be logged in to check verification

error.contactSupport: If this issue persists, please contact support.
